h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell
content: When you’re ready to move on, make sure you’re fully healed up from dealing with that snake, as the end of this downward path leads to the titular marsh where a very strong boss waits to block your path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell' and the sub-subsection 'Marsh of the White Mist'.
The content is as follows:
When you’re ready to move on, make sure you’re fully healed up from dealing with that snake, as the end of this downward path leads to the titular marsh where a very strong boss waits to block your path.
